title: The week in Alpha
author: VD
content_html:
Vox notes that women are the warier sex.

Susan Walsh comes up with the novel idea that if it doesn’t feel good, you might want to consider not doing it.

Alpha Mail considers a case in written indications of interest as well as the link between Dante’s inferno and the need to break the frame when a woman attempts to subject a man to a qualification interrogation.
